title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 588.6 - Suspension of rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 588.6 - Suspension of rules

State Regulations

Upon an express finding that it is necessary for the
preservation of the public health, safety or general welfare, the agency may
suspend all or a part of the requirements or provisions of these rules, either
in a particular case, on application of a party or on its motion, or in a
general class or classes of cases or instances, and may order proceedings in
accordance with its own direction. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
588.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
